title: Monday Post Show (03-07-22)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (03-07-22)
description:
Bobby starts by giving Amy the Pop Culture Quiz. Bobby started a new show on HBO Max called Winning Time that he started watching and is enjoying. He also talks about a new show that was announced on NBC that people are speculating he is a part of. Bobby talks about what happened recently when he tries to make breakfast for his wife. Keyword being “tried”. We created the bracket for the BBS Theme Song Contest. We test out the Google Hum feature to see if it can guess the song that Bobby is humming. A voicemail also asks us to bring back Morning Corny After Dark.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
